body: Thank you for the detailed explanation. It will be really hard to debug as I can't re-create it on my machine. I will try to update the method to use Popen and see if that solves the issue. If you want to give it a try yourself check [runMultipleBatchFiles component as an example](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/running-several-e-simulations-at-a-time?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1380006&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987).
